Posts.Content: KAT1 wrote: Hi , i am 29 years old this is my long story well i'l try to make it short . I found a lump in my breast last year so I went to the doctor he sent me to get an ultrasound , that was the worst moment of my life just to lay there waiting for the answer i cried through the whole process then finally teh doctor told me they looked like fibroadenoma , he said i have 3 more in my other breast , I felt relief but he did say i needed to get the bigger one removed which i couldnt do it at that time cuz i didnt have the money. So last month i had a miscarriage and after that i have been feeling a lot of pain in my breast i have decided to go and see a breast surgeon now that i can afford it . Now my mind is going crazy , the fear is back "what if" what if it's cancer , i have been so depressed i cried when i am alone , i have a sore throat and i am thinking maybe the cancer is spreading i know it sounds crazy but thats how i feel ... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Losing my mind KAT1 Jenny812

Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2007 07:15AM KAT1 wrote: I have my husband with me but, I don't like to talk about this fears to him and not even to my family , I just don't want to make them worried , I keep this to myself.. my husband says that I have nothing to worry about because the doctor told me it's benign.
